column5: OMER I purchased another 5000 shares today I finally got around to reviewing all of the 10Q I have been traveling I think sub20 is a steal I also have the luxury of most shares cost avg around 1415 I say it sure is funny to look back 3 years ago at some of the bullish sentiment when this was priced at 27 and beyond Those poor souls probably got burned and sold out PS I watched Wall Street for the first time on the flight home Maybe that will be us but without the insider trading part
Potential Whale Trades for OMER Largest Trade 216 of Volume icebergbotcomsOMER

OMER Know the risks look at a chart Consider the upside also If were right about Narso youre looking at a multibillion dollar company not a heavy lift at all Then theres the real bull case which we neednt concern ourselves with now We can revisit that pending certain confirmations on Narso

OMER if youre very conservative OMER is worth about 15B on OMIDRIA alone no pipeline If youre aggressive OMER is worth between 400 and 800 a share 510 years out I like owning this company because the pipeline doesnt have to pan out for this to be a safe play They already have an approved drug Market isnt doing the math JCODE shows CMS is viewing OMIDRIA as a drug now not a surgical supply From this we can assume that permanent passthrough will follow My two cents Dont sue me

OMER I dont believe the company or its research people expect bad news They have been hiring employees to take them to the next step as if approval is in hand Unless something really unexpected by the company and the FDA happens then I believe it is full steam ahead no stops

OMER we souls will bounce around until news is made if bad we are in the 13s if good surpassing our highs I honestly fear end points were not met or did they DRG US investors are at Your merciesSpeak to us

OMER webcast now available for playback if you didnt catch it live Omidria real world data and benefits looks stronger and stronger and hard to ignore 4mill cataract OPs per year and patent till 2035 going to be a powerful cashcowTMA endpoints just around the corner and so is BLAIgan P2 c2 trial is ongoing and new more data next month in BudapestOms527 P1 sounds like a success and P2 nicotine next upAll in all a very possitive call
OMER todays presentation replay and slides are available now eventwebcastscomstarther

OMER presentations are NOT the place to reveal news Its a way for companies to talk about their pipeline I guess the meaningful updated part was the on track to break record sales in this quarter as well Thats actually very important as Omidria continues to gain traction Also it seems to me that they are starting to prioritize the oncology platform GPR174 sounds very promising with Tcells suppression but a long way out Look for a PR soon if you want to be excited about news

OMER Red you should take TJ a little more serious I sit on his every word He is a polished trader I am seriously considering selling my shares based on his knowledge He cares about us cultist and wants nothing but good for us NOT
